actions.description: 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage plus 2 (1d4) lightning damage.
actions.name: Lightning Mace

actions.description: 4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) slashing damage.
actions.name: Handaxe

specialTraits.description: The guardian has advantage on saving throws against the frightened condition.
specialTraits.name: Brave
